model_answer: The option that best reinforces the idea of spotting manipulated media is D: A man in a light blue shirt holding an ice cream cone against a clear blue sky. This image, which depicts a common, everyday scenario, is likely to be manipulated if it were to contain deepfake elements. The casual setting and neutral subject matter make it easier to overlook any artificial alterations.

The visuals shown during this segment are option B: A woman in a white tank top climbing a chain attached to a large ball in an industrial setting, and option C: A close-up of three gold Bitcoin coins in front of a blurred stock market graph.
